title: Nigakute Amai
overview: Maki Eda, a good-looking and career woman, actually hates vegetables. One day, she meets Katayama Nagisa, a good-looking art teacher at a boys' school and a vegetarian, and by chance she ends up living with him. For some reason, Nagisa treats the innocent Maki carelessly. Despite the conflict, Maki finds herself in love with Nagisa, who turns out to be gay. Still, Maki is healed by Nagisa's organic dishes. As they solve their own problems, they become important to each other, but...
